# Examples

Practical examples and code samples for using MCP Ticketer.

## üìö Contents

This directory will contain practical examples and code samples for common MCP Ticketer use cases.

### Planned Examples

#### Basic Usage
- Simple ticket creation
- Configuration examples
- Common CLI patterns

#### Advanced Usage
- Bulk operations
- Custom workflows
- Integration patterns

#### Platform-Specific Examples
- Linear integration examples
- GitHub integration examples
- JIRA integration examples

#### MCP Integration
- MCP tool usage examples
- Claude Desktop integration
- Custom MCP implementations
